name: Dog Domestication
description: Early humans begin domesticating wolves, leading to the first dogs. This marks one of humanity's first animal partnerships.

name: Agriculture
description: Development of agriculture and the beginning of settled human communities.

name: Cat Domestication
description: Cats begin living alongside humans in the Fertile Crescent, likely attracted to rodents in grain storage.

name: Writing Systems
description: Development of the first writing systems in Mesopotamia, marking the beginning of recorded history.

name: Great Pyramid of Giza
description: Completion of the Great Pyramid of Giza, the oldest and largest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: Colossus of Rhodes
description: Completion of the Colossus of Rhodes, a 108-foot-tall bronze statue of Helios.

name: First Firearms
description: First recorded use of a hand cannon in Europe, marking the beginning of firearms technology.

name: Printing Press
description: Johannes Gutenberg invents the movable-type printing press.

name: Steam Engine
description: James Watt patents the steam engine, kickstarting the Industrial Revolution.

name: Telephone
description: Alexander Graham Bell patents the telephone.

name: First Flight
description: Wright brothers achieve the first sustained, controlled, powered flight.

name: Plastic Invention
description: Leo Baekeland invents Bakelite, the first fully synthetic plastic.

name: Discovery of Penicillin
description: Alexander Fleming discovers penicillin.

name: First Nuclear Weapon
description: First atomic bomb used in warfare over Hiroshima, marking the beginning of the nuclear age.

name: First Video Game
description: A.S. Douglas creates OXO (tic-tac-toe), considered one of the first video games, for the EDSAC computer.

name: CERN Founded
description: The European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN) is established.

name: Moon Landing
description: Neil Armstrong becomes the first human to step on the Moon.

name: First Microplastic Discovery
description: Scientists first discover plastic particles in ocean waters, marking the beginning of microplastic awareness.

name: World Wide Web
description: Tim Berners-Lee invents the World Wide Web.

name: ISS Construction Begins
description: Launch of Zarya, the first module of the International Space Station.

name: Large Hadron Collider
description: CERN's Large Hadron Collider becomes operational, the world's largest and highest-energy particle collider.

name: Present Day
description: Current date as of this timeline's creation.
